welcome to dpm:
Welcome to Desmos Profile Manager (DPM)!

To start interacting with Desmos please create a new profile or import an existing.
save the recovery passphrase:
Please save the recovery passphrase in a safe place.
This will be the only way to recover your account!!
please check your recovery passphrase: Please enter your secret recovery phrase in order and make sure your secret recovery phrase is written correctly
provide a password to protect your accou:
Please provide a password to secure your account keys.
This password will be also used to authorize all the operations.
password must be longer than 8 chars: Password must be longer than 8 chars
error generating account keys: An error occurred while generating the account keys
